law.catch_line: The registration fee and all late fees under this subtitle shall be placed in a special fund to be u...
law.text: The registration fee and all late fees under this subtitle shall be placed in a special fund to be used only to defray partially the cost of administering this subtitle. Notwithstanding any other provisions of this Code, any unexpended funds up to a maximum of $75,000 may not revert to the general funds of the State at the end of the fiscal year.
